subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Christian Fittipaldi will drive for Andretti Green Racing in the American Le Mans sports car series next season. Fittipaldi, a 36-year-old Brazilian and nephew of the two-time Formula One champion and Indianapolis 500 winner Emerson Fittipaldi, is a former CART teammate of Michael Andretti, a co-owner of A.G.R.
